scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:server: podman-compose -f podman-compose.test.yml build server-test && podman-compose -f podman-compose.test.yml run --rm server-test
scripts.test:frontend: podman-compose -f podman-compose.test.yml build frontend-test && podman-compose -f podman-compose.test.yml run --rm frontend-test
